title: How Morrisons are supporting farmers to plant trees

content.text: Morrisons are supporting a team of Tree Advisors from the Forest Canopy Foundation to give specialist advice to their network of 3,000 farmers, to help plant the right tree species in the right place for the right reasons. The advice includes how to access government and grant funding to cover famers’ costs, as well as how to manage woodland projects for both additional income and environmental benefits, without impacting upon individual farm businesses.
